title: Mage: The Ascension
description: Ours is the power of Solomon, the magic of Merlin, the fall of Icarus. From countless ages we have dreamed, from endless worlds we have beckoned, from infinite choices we have suffered. The world chokes under stifling conformity, hopes crumble in the fire of mediocrity, heroes die in the snare of pride. Armageddon is at hand. Reality is a lie. The truth is magic.Open your eyes and Awaken.
author: Kevin Murphy
